name: Men's Exoplanets Hunter Cap
description:
Upon transfer of Project Discovery to CONCORD, a new program of exoplanets hunting was embarked on by the citizen science platform. The Exoplanets Hunter Cap is often seen being worn both off-duty and at work by members of the Project Discovery Exoplanets Program.

Incorporating the Project Discovery Exoplanets Program logo and colors, this cap displays the wearer's interest and involvement in the search for planets outside the bounds of human-explored space.
